title: verbinding met de server verbroken, opnieuw verbinding maken
content:
Halo,

wij zijn een carrefour supermarkt en bestellen vele artikelen via een bestelsite.

Namelijk bij de volgende bestelsite https://eurokip.internetbestel.nl/solutions/RIB/index.html# krijgen we steeds de volgende foutmelding verbinding met de server verbroken, opnieuw verbinding maken en dan steeds een grijs/ roos scherm.

Op de laptop lukt dit ons wel op de vaste computer lukt dit niet.

Hij wil dus echt wel verbinding maken, dat merk je maar dan toch lukt het niet en dan even een grijs/roos scherm.

Kunnen jullie mij een beetje raad geven of het mee helpen oplossen?

Dank je wel Astrid

title: Youtube on second screen lagging to hell
content:
I used to play World of Tank and look at YouTube on my second screen. Everything went smooth untill this week. YouTube on Firefox on my second screen is lagging or freezing. I tried Opera, I tried Edge it worked fine, but with Firefox, it is no more possible to play YouTube on my second screen while playing. It is not a matter of graphic hardware as this issue only happen with Firefox. I tried to deactivate every module and to reinstall Firefox (either the Beta version) but still got the same lagging and freeze on YouTube. Do you need anything that can help you to investigate this issue, this is really terribly frustrating and boring.

Best regards Patrick / Darkiger

title: Secure Connection Failed on Archive of Our Own (Ao3)
content:
I CANNOT get on to Archive of Our own, all firefox does is tell me "Secure Connection Failed" and display an error page. I have done everything, I have cleared my cache I have tried disabling security things and add ons I have tried the "about:config" thing MULTIPLE TIMES. It's only happening on my computer not on my phone PLEASE someone fix this I just want to update my fanfics I don't know why this is happening it's only been going on for about a week and it is UNBEARABLE.

Entire error message:


Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to archiveofourown.org. You are attempting to import a cert with the same issuer/serial as an existing cert, but that is not the same cert.

Error code: SEC_ERROR_REUSED_ISSUER_AND_SERIAL 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.

Learn more‚Ä¶

title: Cannot use browser
content:
I am trying to switch back to Firefox after having used it once before. However, I am unable to use the browser at all. I have to run it with administrator permissions for it to even open, and when it does open, I am met with a completely blank grey screen with nothing but my bookmarks. I cannot click any bookmarks, nor can I click anything on the sidebar [passwords, account, etc.] I can't search anything, and I can't use direct links.

I have uninstalled four times using Revo Uninstaller, removed all lingering data all four times, refreshed the browser, refreshed my account, changed my account password, run troubleshooting mode, updated my computer, updated my drivers, and updated the app. Absolutely nothing has worked, and I am still unable to use it.

I'm not sure what else I can do.

title: Update issues from 128.7 ESR to 135
content:
I just migrated from an older Mac to a newer one running Mac OS 15 (Sequoia) and none of my bookmarks, autofill info, passwords, cookies and browsing history etc migrated to the new version (135) of firefox that I downloaded. When I check the updates section of 128.7, it says it's up to date, but I know you can run 135 on Sequoia, so that's why I downloaded 135. When I looked at the profile folder in 135, which is existing separately on the Mac from 128.7, I noticed that it was pointed at the folder with release in its name that was inside the profile folder. In 128.7 it's pointed at the other folder with default in the name (the profile folder only seems to contain two folders). How do I get all of my old info to migrate to 135? Or how do I get 135 to point at the proper folder inside of the Profile folder?

Thanks
